text: Peue jicok laen dum jih keu Tuhan Jipeugot tuhan nyang bukon Allah Takheun toh daliteuh dum di gata Jinoe beu sigra laju tapeugah Nyoe kitab bak lon get kitab dilee Bandum nyan teuntee hana geupeugah Geupeugah bandum haba peuingat Keu bandum umat beuna ngon salah Tapi le that jih hana jiteupeue Jicok nyang bateue nyang hak jikeubah
